text: Charles Harold Scrymgeour (June 15, 1914 - November 24, 2000) was a Canadian curler. He was the second of the 1942 Brier Champion team (skipped by Ken Watson), representing Manitoba.http://passages.winnipegfreepress.com/passage- details/id-56650/name-Charles_Scrymgeour/ ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian male curlers
